org.fest.assertions
Class Fail

java.lang.Object
  org.fest.assertions.Fail

public final class Fail
extends Object

Understands failure methods.

Author:
Alex Ruiz, Yvonne Wang

Method Summary
static void fail()
          Fails with no message.
static void fail(String message)
          Fails with the given message.
static void fail(String message, Throwable realCause)
          Throws an AssertionError with the given message an with the Throwable that caused the failure.
